subject: Baseball
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Molitor, a Hall of Famer who spent most of his career with the Brewers, led Minnesota to a 32-22 record entering Saturday by helping his players focus on the finer points of the game.
snippet: Molitor, a Hall of Famer who spent most of his career with the Brewers, led Minnesota to a 32-22 record entering Saturday by helping his players focus on the finer points of the game.
